930730.name: Getaway Grand Prix
930730.description: Getaway Grand Prix is a criminally addictive Arcade Maze-em-up. You are the Getaway Driver! Put your foot to the floor, snatching cash and valuables as you speed across the city. Stay a step ahead of the law as you swipe gems from under their noses, or catch 'em off guard by ramming them off the block. STEER CLEAR of all kinds of traps, barricades and hazards... or CRASH AND BURN! Swipe the gems and escape the law in a thrill ride of HIGH-SPEED MOTOR HEIST MADNESS!
